name: Magic Piano Tile Anime
description:
Popular rhythm game for Anime fans.
Piano in your pocket. Update new songs every week.
Play piano with over 150+ OST songs from most popular Anime 2020.

Recommended for people who enjoy:
- Anime rhythm games
- Anime OST piano covers
- Want to play piano with favorite songs
- One of best free anime rhythm games
- Anime OST music

How to play:
- Touch the piano tiles several times to play the piano.
- Simple to play, but hard to master.
- Getting all the tiles in this high-speed music game is definitely not easy!

Game features:
- Excellent game design and flat graphics
- High quality Anime OST piano music
- There is a large collection of Anime piano songs
- Gaming experience smoother
- Collection of gems
- Add favorites
- Get experience, open new levels.
- 100% free music game
